name: K Webster
text: The food was great the staff was fair. The food deserved a 5 star the staff weren't as friendly except the manager. With the increased prices of Pizza Hut compared to other pizza places it should be completely perfect!

name: L. B.
text: The salad bar needs improvement. Other than the pizza and service was good.

name: Lena Auten
text: Waiter was very polite. The food was served quickly,hot and it was very good. This was our first time at this Pizza Hut,but we would come back. üôÇ

name: Becky Moskal
text: I've always loved Pizza Hut.  There pizza is the best, I think. Especially fresh.  I live to go there & sit down to eat there.  Don't get to do that often enough.  Staff is always friendly too.

name: Raevyn Knight
text: All I have to say is CHICKEN BACON TOMATO PARMESAN PAN CRUST Pizza! Best there is. Period. Never eat any other pizza ever.

name: Linda Stitt
text: I love the pizza there.

name: Daveinator 17
text: Place wasn't the best Pizza Hut we've been to, but it certainly hasn't been the worst. That spot is forever claimed by the one in O'Neil, Nebraska. The pizza was hot and fresh, but it wasn't always out there at a good time. It took them ‚Ä¶More

text: Typical Pizza Hut, nothing noteworthy about the food. If you are not familiar with Pizza Hut for some reason, it is definitely on the greasy side, but it is delicious. They have excellent pan, stuffed crust, and thin crust pizza. This is an ‚Ä¶More

text: As a child pizza hut was the awesomiest place to go. The other day may daughter and I went for her first time. Blah... Buffet used to be great! Also my daughter was charged 7 bucks and she's. 3 didn't even eat a bite.

name: George Camlin
text: This place used to be great, but no longer. Pior service and bad food. I would NOT recommend this place.

name: Carol Ashmore
text: Very good service. Fast. Excellent wings and pizza.

text: All around not good. There are a lot of flies, dim lights,dirty windows with spiders, and also I have been here for 20 minutes and no one came to check up on us, but the area in general is clean such as floor tables and chairs. Also the food is not worth it.

name: James Clark Jr
text: This location closed permanently the day before üòñ.

text: Our waitress Cass was wonderful and very kind! Best dine in experience I‚Äôve ever had. Service was better than most 5 star restaurants.

text: Server was friendly and food was decent. Nice atmosphere with a cool a/c for the hot summer days!

name: Dan Mathers
text: Great pizza and great servers. But takes too long for buffet to be replenished. Even in slow days there are only a few pieces left for everyone?

name: Pete Jurofcik
text: Waitress was fantastic! Food was great. Disappointed; no salad bar.

name: Madame Meowth
text: Place has gone downhill. Got rid of their best staff and hired a bunch of drug dealers and trashy people. They need to close this location down.

name: mike o
text: Pizza not how I ordered it. No seasoning on the breadsticks or cinnamon sticks either. There were only 4 tables occupied in the dining area and the 3 wait staff didn't seem like they were able to keep up. I'll be going to the chestnut st location from now on.

name: Kimberly Smock
text: Staff doesn't wear gloves while touching your food. Food was cold, old & lacked flavor.    Stopped here cuz it was convenient but WOW this store is NOT up to standards.  Pizza Hut corporate would be ashamed! The only positive thing was the waitress & she was filling in from another store.

name: Jason Young
text: Very FAST, FRIENDLY service. Great food. WONDERFUL staff. Had a stupendous time with the family.

text: Great pizza love the stuffed crust

name: Jamie Toward
text: Food good.  Staff nice.

name: Kayla Tuttle
text: The last 2 times I've been there were both bad experiences. The first time one waitress was extremely chatty and Interrupted during the meal countless times to chat, though she was efficient and competent. Food was good as usual, though ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenene H
text: Had the best customer service , food was hot and the taste was wonderful. Great job Pizza Hut!

name: Kelvin Armstrong
text: Foods good and fairly quick, but they're professionalism could use some work. I'm sure folks would rather not hear about their disputes in the back.

text: Good customer service at the one on Murtland!

text: The worst pizza dining experience for 20 yrs that I've been in America. I forced myself to give 1 star when it should have been less than half a star. Soon as we walked in to the bldg staff was already annoying and rude repeating herself. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Jenks
text: The thin crust pizza we ate with pepperoni, sausage and mushrooms was very good with the dining experience. However, the to go plain cheese pizza was very dry with little to hardly any cheese.

name: Chris Monroe
text: One lady who always serves us is absolutely wonderful...manages to serve us and the entire  restaurant effortlessly...a wonderful credit to your murtland ave store!

text: These guys are like a monkey $%#@!$% a football. The orders are mostly wrong and they got lost delivering to a place they have delivered to about 11 times. Also the girl taking the phone orders has an attitude when you place an order. Gee sorry for asking you to do your job........

text: It was terrible. The plates were dirty and 1 had a finger nail on it. When she gave us new plates they were dirty and the women put them in the salad bar. I had to eat on paper towels. Its so disgusting.
